MsgChannelLanguageKeyword.name: MsgChannelLanguageKeyword
MsgChannelLanguageKeyword.description: Represents the consent configuration for a Messaging channel.

CustomKeywords.description: The keywords a Messaging end user can send to receive the Custom Response.

CustomResponse.description: The automated response sent when a Messaging end user sends a Custom Keyword.

DoubleOptInKeywords.description: The keywords a Messaging end user can send to doubly opt in to receiving messages.

HelpKeywords.description: The keywords a Messaging end user can send to request help during a Messaging session.

HelpResponse.description: The automated response sent when a Messaging end user requests help.

MasterLanguage.description: The language used for this consent configuration.

MessagingChannelId.description: The ID of the associated Messaging channel.

MessagingChannelUsageId.description: The ID of the associated Messaging channel usage record, which is in turn associated with a messaging channel.

OptInConfirmation.description: The automated response sent when a Messaging end user opts in to receiving messages.

OptInKeywords.description: The keywords a Messaging end user can send to explicitly opt in to receiving messages.

OptOutConfirmation.description: The automated response sent when a Messaging end user opts out of receiving messages.

OptOutKeywords.description: The keywords a Messaging end user can send to opt out of receiving messages.
